summary: A rich man asks a womanizing playboy to marry his daughter and make a grandson for him.
cast: Rock Hudson|Leslie Caron|Charles Boyer|Walter Slezak|Dick Shawn|Larry Storch|Nita Talbot|Norma Varden|George Furth|Marcel Hillaire|Jay Novello|Stafford Repp|Danica D'Hondt|Frank De Vol|John Harding|Lillian Adams|Don Beddoe|Helen Brown|Paul Bryar|Peter Camlin|George Cisar|Lysa D'Anjou|Jesslyn Fax|Gil Frye|Sam Harris|Tom Hatten|Jimmy Hayes|Allen Joseph|Dorothy Keller|Kenner G. Kemp|Frank Kreig|Syl Lamont|Irene Martin|Alvy Moore|Barry O'Hara|Beverly Randolph|Patty Regan|Sheila Rogers|Jeffrey Sayre|Susanne Sidney|Bert Stevens|Arthur Tovey|Kim Williams|Patricia Winters
title: El favor
